title: Zayn Malik's new bald head dividing fans as he makes social media comeback
text:

Zayn Malik has gone for a new look, and it's sent his fans into meltdown mode, for the good and the bad.

The former One Direction star, 26, took to Instagram to show off his new style, and he is now completely bald with a shaved head.

In the photo, he rocks a black jumper and a cool nose piercing, but he left fans to do the talking as the photo was left without a caption.

Divided Zayn fans left a host of comments questioning his new move.

One person asked: "Whyyyyyyyyy?" while another commented a line of heart faces in contrast.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: PA)

Another simply wrote: "Oh my god", suggesting they are unsure of his new do.

Zayn has been MIA with social media posts of himself, with the last being a selfie when the star had a full head of hair back in July.

(Image: Instagram)

But he's been busy with music it seems, as he went solo to pursue his music career following One Direction's split in 2016.

The 26-year-old recently posted a photo of his new single Rumours, which is a huge move for the star as he is featured on songstress Sabrina Claudio's album.

Since the huge boy band split, they have each gone separate ways to make their own music.

(Image: Getty)

His appearance on social media comes after former band mate Niall Horan admitted the boys would have ended up killing each other if they hadn't split when they did.

The now solo star says that despite the band's huge success, they ended up having a series of bust-ups and "s****y arguments'.

But it hasn't always been easy for Malik. In 2017 when he went solo, he admitted he "struggled" to figure out who he wanted to be as a solo artist.

(Image: Getty Images)

He has been known to cancel gigs in the past over his battle with anxiety, but revealed he felt more focused sure of himself after recording music with producer Rob Cavallo.

He told Billboard magazine : "It definitely helped identify in my own mind where I want to be as an entertainer.

"For a long time I've struggled with, 'Where is Zayn as a performer?'"
description: The former One Direction star has made a comeback to social media - but he's gone bald
